description.text:
-You are hit by a tiny snowball - Hehe, stop being so serious!
 Who care about the troubles of the $(b;winter)Winter$() and $(b;summer)Summer$() Court! 

 W-what!? If I keep playing a $(b;winter)enderman$() will come get me? 
 That's not funny! Hmph! 
Before we go can we at least $(b;spring)make$() a $(b;winter)snowman$()!
 'Do you want to...' - You hit the pixie with a snowball before she can utter that sentence-
